scripts.avatar: cd projects/ngx-avatar && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-avatar --prod && cd dist/ngx-avatar && npm publish --access=public
scripts.flatpickr: cd projects/ngx-flatpickr && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-flatpickr && cd dist/ngx-flatpickr && npm publish --access=public
scripts.editor: cd projects/ngx-mat-editor && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-mat-editor && cd dist/ngx-mat-editor && npm publish --access=public
scripts.select: cd projects/ngx-mat-select && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-mat-select && cd dist/ngx-mat-select && npm publish --access=public
scripts.rights: cd projects/ngx-rights && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-rights && cd dist/ngx-rights && npm publish --access=public
scripts.roles: cd projects/ngx-roles && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-roles && cd dist/ngx-roles && npm publish --access=public
scripts.timepicker: cd projects/ngx-timepicker && bump --minor && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-timepicker && cd dist/ngx-timepicker && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish: npm-run-all avatar flatpickr editor select rights roles timepicker
